sentences.sContent: I'm in such a drive that I can't expatiate.
sentences.sContent_eng: I'm in such a drive that I can't expatiate.
sentences.sCn: 我的时间实在紧迫，不能详述。

remMethod.val: ex(出) + pat(走) + iate → 走出去 → 细说， 详述

trans.tranOther: to enlarge (on a theme, topic, etc) at length or in detail; elaborate (on)
